title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-11.
